import React,{useReducer}from'react';import{v4 as uuid}from'uuid';import alertContext from'./alertContext';import alertReducer from'./alertReducer';import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from'../types';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AlertState=props=>{const initialState=[];const[state,dispatch]=useReducer(alertReducer,initialState);// Set Alert
